name: Se/\/Se
description:
You play as a nameless monster hunter, looking to make a quick buck, but this mission could very well be your last. With 6 unique enemies to look out for, with an ever-decreasing supply of your starting 5 senses and 5 gadgets, it takes skill to manage your resources and escape with barely anything left.

Survive each room using your senses and gadgets and find the exit.
Plan ahead and manage your gadgets and senses wisely because the ones you use the most will be the ones you lose at the end of the level and you must continue without them.
Learn the behaviors of each enemy to aid your survival.

A strategy, maze, horror game to satiate your need for action.
